cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.13.0)

add_library(OpenMesh INTERFACE)

file(GLOB STATIC_LIBS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/*.lib")
target_link_libraries(OpenMesh INTERFACE
    $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/OpenMeshCored.lib>
    $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/OpenMeshToolsd.lib>
    $<$<NOT:$<CONFIG:Debug>>:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/OpenMeshCore.lib>
    $<$<NOT:$<CONFIG:Debug>>:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/OpenMeshTools.lib>
)
